name: PowerCore (ShaubbyPlayz)
description:
PowerCore is a game where the objective is to keep the PowerCore alive. Monsters will attack the PowerCore and it is your job to defend. Throughout the game you can buy/upgrade turrets, and purchase upgrades for your player to help defend from waves of monsters which progressively get more difficult. Use WASD to move and use arrow keys to shoot. You can use space to roll/dash. To navigate the menus use the up arrow and down arrow and space. To purchase upgrades and turrets, use E, R, and Q.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 46
